message: Your cut will be worth less next round. Let's settle this now with a slightly better deal for me.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bit more
Alice, this is getting us nowhere. Take this offer, before inflation eats away more of your potential gains.
I'm still not convinced, let's meet in the middle of our last offers
Alice, this is my final offer.  Take this and we both walk away with something substantial.  Another refusal and inflation will seriously erode your share.
